data.text: Nde laxi won ma masenyi ra?
A xa konyi lu nɛ alɔ sansi xuri, naxan tixi bɔxi xare ma.
Mixi raɲaaxuxi nan nu a ra ɲama mu tinxi naxan na.
A bara won ma tɔɔrɛ findi a gbe ra,
Kɔnɔ a sɔxɔ nɛ won ma yunubie xa fe ra,
Won birin nu lɔɛxi nɛ alɔ xuruse naxee yensenma wula i,
Tɔɔrɛ nun fe xɔrɔxɔɛ to a li,
A to gɛ kiiti tinxintare sɔtɔde, a naxa faxa.
E nu wama a fure ragatafe mixi ɲaaxie nan ya ma,
Alatala bara natɛ tongo a xa a ɲaxankata tɔɔrɛ ra,
A na gɛ a xa wali rabade,
N tide xungbe soma nɛ a yi ra,
